Key Match Events: David Wiese's heroics in the Super Over gave Namibia a win in their opening ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 contest
Ruben Trumpelmann got rid of Kashyap Prajapati and Aqib Ilyas off the first two balls of the game
Mehran Khan's stunning spell helped Oman tie the game
David Wiese and Gerhard Erasmus made the most of Bilal Khan's pace and hit four boundaries to take 21 runs off Namibia's allotted Super Over
Pre-Game Insights: Oman skipper Aqib Ilyas wasn't perturbed by the fact that his side had to bat first, believing that the ball would come well to the bat and improve their scoring opportunities
Post-Match Reflections: Namibia hold nerve to win Super Over thriller against Oman
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into a Super Over after Oman and Namibia were tied in the final over
Mehran Khan gave merely seven runs for three wickets in his three overs
